@requires_authorization
def somefunc(param1='', param2=0):
    '''A docstring'''

JavaScript ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š

/**
* nth element in the fibonacci series.
* @param n >= 0
* @return the nth element, >= 0.
*/
function fib(n) {
  var a = 1, b = 1;
  var tmp;
  while (--n >= 0) {
    tmp = a;
    a += b;
    b = tmp;
  }
  return a;
}

document.write(fib(10));
